nodes.documentation:
@title Financial instrument interface
All instrument contract must implement this interface.
nodes.name: Instrument
EventScheduled
createIssuance
engage

nodes.documentation: Buyer/Seller has made a transfer of Ether to the issuance
nodes.name: processTransfer

nodes.documentation: Buyer/Seller has made a transfer of ERC20 token to the issuance
nodes.name: processTokenTransfer

createIssuance(uint256,address,string).details: Create a new issuance of the financial instrument

params.seller_address: The address of the seller who creates this issuance
params.seller_data: The custom parameters to the newly created issuance

engage(uint256,string,address,string).details: A buyer engages to the issuance

params.buyer_address: The address of the buyer who engages in the issuance
params.buyer_data: The custom parameters to the new engagement
params.state: The current state of the issuance

devdoc.title: Financial instrument interface All instrument contract must implement this interface.

processTokenTransfer(uint256,string,addr.notice: Buyer/Seller has made a transfer of ERC20 token to the issuance

processTransfer(uint256,string,address,u.notice: Buyer/Seller has made a transfer of Ether to the issuance
